name: CreateMailchimpConnectedSite
description:
Create a new Mailchimp connected site.

This tool is used to create a new connected site in Mailchimp. It should be called whenever you need to integrate a new site with Mailchimp's marketing tools.

parameters.name: site_unique_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier string for the site. This is used to distinguish different connected sites in Mailchimp.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the site.

parameters.name: connected_site_domain
parameters.description: The domain of the site you want to connect to Mailchimp.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: foreign_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the site.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the site.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
